website_summaries.verdict: LEGO hit the ball out of the park by perfectly replicating Bastion’s unique style from the hit video game Overwatch, from his light-up head, to his intimidating sentry mode.
pros: Realistic LEGO model-figure of Overwatch’s Bastion robot
Easily transforms from robot to sentry mode
cons: You need to place Bastion’s sticker decals yourself

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves LEGO, and I live Overwatch. So this was a great gift for both of us. It looks awesome, and it took him less than a hour to build. Which I was pleasantly surprised because there’s a lot to this set.
customer_reviews.author: K Al

customer_reviews.title: LOOK AT THIS BEAST!!
customer_reviews.text: I mean come on, look at this guy. It looks absolutely crazy. This is a permanent spot on my cool stuff shelf. It is not flimsy. Its a solid structure standing really tall. I put an iron next to it for scale (Shown in pictures) Excellent quality, just perfect in every way. I have no complains.
customer_reviews.author: Darkmane

customer_reviews.title: Best. LEGO set. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played with LEGO sets my entire life, and this is my all-time favorite set. I also play Overwatch, but even if you don’t, this is a great robot LEGO set that can transform into a sentry position. It’s huge - standing at 10 inches. Fully articulated and very much poseable. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ein727

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for Overwatch+Lego fans.
customer_reviews.text: Great build for 40$. Very sturdy. I would only dock this for having remove his head to transform (there's no place to fold it away) and the big turret barrel on his back looks like crap in "sentry mode" (when he's all turned around and just looks like a minigun turret). He looks a lot better than the Reinhardt or Dva that were also released though he is obviously not to scale. Still a great value for 700 pieces, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hump

customer_reviews.title: Best Mech ever!
customer_reviews.text: This mech will stand anywhere. It’s ankle movement is like humans. It moves up, down, side to side. It will stand on any uneven surface. Cool unique colors and stickers. Love the red light on the head.
customer_reviews.author: Wishebone

customer_reviews.title: Lego Overwatch Blizzard - First piece in set is wrong shape, can't assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Step one, pull out pieces only to realize that they aren't what is pictured in the manual and you can't even makeshift these to work. Step two, pack it back up and return it all or call the manufacturer. Step three, buy a different set. Super disappointing that the very first piece out of the box is wrong. If you can't see the picture well, the arm should click in so it swings horizontally but the base pieces included in the set are vertically oriented. This is the base for everything, so no part of this can be assembled to create the robot with moving limbs. Not a great gift unless you just want to bulk buy some legos.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Lego sets, and definitely my favorite of the Overwatch series. It was easy but fun to put together and is very sturdy once completed!
customer_reviews.author: Err

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's Lego so that's it, just buy it~ OK, just kidding, but it's good, seriously. I didn't know the game, overwatch or something, I just wanted a Lego robot so I picked this one and it's much cheaper than the store. It's very interesting that it can transform to a turret or tank something, I didn't try but I know it can. Anyway, Lego means fun, just buy it ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Pei Su

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego robot in a Bionicle size
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy block robot because Lego pieces click together and fit well, unlike some off-brands we've tried. My 7yr-old loves giant fighting robots he built it himself no problem. He's been building Bionicle since he transitioned from Duplo, we miss Bionicle! The off-brands are garbage, Lego is the best. More Bionicle-like robots please!
customer_reviews.author: Al V

customer_reviews.title: Kids Will Love This!
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year old son loved it! He put the whole thing together himself, without any help. He had a great time and he keeps playing with it, along with his little brother. We didn't even realize there was a lighted brick. Don't worry, the battery was included.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your money Lego set
customer_reviews.text: One of the best value for your money Lego sets I’ve seen in a long time! Great quality and much bigger than I had expected it to be. Now if only Lego would make all other sets as affordable as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Deptawa

customer_reviews.title: Fun build, cute poses.
customer_reviews.text: Do you love LEGO? Do you hate it when Bastion is nano-boosted and sitting in an immortality field? You should get this, it’s cute and not super difficult to put together. I think it took around 80 minutes while watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Davy Coniglio

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great lego set. Took a few hours to build. Nothing especially challenging, but interesting to build either way. Looks really great. Changing between the two modes is a bit convoluted, but I don't plan on doing it often, if ever (it's not an action figure after all).
customer_reviews.author: Xælias

customer_reviews.title: Typical terrific LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: As always, Lego puts out a phenomenal product. My son is so thrilled with this purchase. He saved up his own money and wasn’t disappointed. Also, it was $13 less than at a major store he checked first, so all the more exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Love4thewin

customer_reviews.title: It's Bastion!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sweet set. My son built it and it even converts into the turret form. Only thing that could make it better is if the colors matched the LEGO Bastion skin in game.
customer_reviews.author: James Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: A pretty heavy and large model and one they 9 year old felt proud to have completed. It's been a month and he hasn't taken it apart and is still playing with it -- and he doesn't even know what Overwatch is!
customer_reviews.author: G. G.

customer_reviews.title: Beep Beep Boop Bop
customer_reviews.text: It's Lego, it's Bastion, it's powered... it's awesome! Blizzard releases the Overwatch figures in limited edition runs and I was waiting for Bastion for a while. My guess is they wanted to make him repairable and able to transform... so they went with Lego. Seriously, this thing rocks and is a great deal for one of the Overwatch figures, which sometimes cost over $100.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Bastion
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son is a Bastion main (please don't hold it against him, he's only a child) and this was the first thing he played with after opening it on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift to my boyfriend. He loved overwatch, bastion is his favorite, and he loves legos. So it was the perfect gift. He loved being able to build him and he said it was a lot of fun. I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Quite an evening with this lego set!
customer_reviews.text: A friend and I bought this set as we love overwatch, we spent a couple of hours of joy like in our childhood days building this set, it has a nice amount of pieces and I love that you can set the lego in 2 different positions easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: After it was put together my son was pretty disappointed. It literally breaks in half when it's standing up. There needs to be more of a brace in the middle. Very top-heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Its a wonderful lego set from my daughter's favorite video game. She built it as soon as she opened the present.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Boop boop boop beep boop!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to build! The instructions are super clear and when he is built, he looks awesome both as a turret and as a standing figure. My only con to him is that there are some parts that fall off and detach very easily so you do have to be very careful when showing him off or moving him around.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He loves the you can move all the joints. And his favorite part is how the eye of it lights up.
customer_reviews.author: maria kurth

customer_reviews.title: Loves the laser light
customer_reviews.text: 11 year old boy received this as a Christmas gift. It took him about an hour to finish it, and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: pinkcookie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally bought for my son who already has this set but will regift.. wonderful, entertaining set
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 9 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves putting this together, didn’t think it was hard but said it was fragile. Great for a 9yr old
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Super Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Nine-year-old grandson loved this set! He loves Legos, robots and challenges! Definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Brearley

customer_reviews.title: My kids, the Lego fans love it
customer_reviews.text: As always, good quality Lego product. My kids love this robot, it also has a light on its head. I bought it when it's on sale, and it was really worth the money. I highly recommend this robot Lego for Lego lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Waverly

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! A good gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend's birthday gift and he loves it! Finished the building in one day and it was a ton of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Gotyep

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this set. Lots of fun. Quick delivery. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: My 11 YO nephew loved it and spent a few hours assembling it. Very happy nephew!

customer_reviews.title: Build a Bastion
customer_reviews.text: Loved this build, loved how blizzard made a lego skin for bastion in game shortly after.

customer_reviews.title: just a great lego thingy.
customer_reviews.text: got it as a bday gift, found nothing wrong with the packaging/product. well designed lego builds are hard to come by, so its a relief to find something so well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Fox

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome, but slightly bummed he couldn't switch into tank-form.
customer_reviews.text: Bastion translated very well into Lego, and even when fully built, he could transform between his walking and turret forms. He even has his bird friend, Ganymede. My only real complaint is that he has no tank (ultimate) form, though I assume that's a limitation of the Lego.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Great robot lego
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of the game Overwatch, but as someone who likes a good robot model, the build and detail on this made it hard to pass up. The light-up head feature is especially well done.

customer_reviews.title: New midkid product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this aS a gift for my grandson. Great product. Keeps him busy! More intricate than plain Legos but not to re univ standards!

customer_reviews.title: Box arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The product inside was fine, but was delivered in a soft shipping package. If your a collector of Lego sets, i recommend buying them in person or risk damaged boxes.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and great value.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 10 yr old grandson for Christmas. He was super excited. I compared prices with 3 other popular stores and found Amazon had the best price.

product_meta.title: LEGO 6250958 Overwatch 75974 Bastion Building Kit, Overwatch Game Robot Action Figure (602 Pieces)
product_meta.description: A fully reconfigurable LEGO Overwatch 75974 Bastion collectable action figure for your favorite Overwatch fan! One of the most recognizable Overwatch characters from the internationally acclaimed team-based action game, this buildable toy robot display model can be configured in recon tank mode or reconfigured into sentry mode without any rebuilding! Fans will love the realistic detail of this Overwatch toy robot model and will want to display it near their gaming setup—an Overwatch collectible for every fan!
feature_bullets: Build a collectible and realistic LEGO version of the Overwatch Bastion posable action figure that can be reconfigured from recon tank mode to sentry mode—no re-assembly required.

This creative play toy robot model set of Overwatch defense hero Bastion features realistic details seen in the game and in animated videos including his friendly bird companion Ganymede. It’s a great collectible for any Overwatch fan
Bastion building robot toy in recon mode stands over 10” (26cm) tall and in sentry mode stands over 6” (17cm) tall; 602 pieces – For boys and girls aged 10+ and fans and big kids of all ages
LEGO Overwatch building characters and toys make the perfect gifts for fans of the game and are ideal Overwatch gaming collectibles
The LEGO Overwatch Bastion building action figure can be assembled together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for creative building and acting out scenes from Overwatch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars924 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
